text: Yintoni kanye ngani ukuba ningalwi eNdleleni ka-Allâh, (nilwele) nabo bangenamandla (okuzikhusela), baphethwe kakubi, bacinezelekileyo eluntwini, abafazi nabantwana, abasikhalo sabo sikukuthi: “Nkosi yethu! Khawusisindise kwesi sixeko sibantu baso bangabacinezeli; Usivelisele umntu ovela kuWe oza kusikhusela, Usivelisele kananjalo umntu ovela kuWe oza kusinceda”
